content: ## Restore or copy previous versions You can restore a previous workflow version, or make a copy of it: 1. On the version you want to restore or copy, select **Options** ![Options icon](/_images/common-icons/three-dot-options-menu.png){.off-glb}. 1. Choose what you want to do: * **Restore this version**: replace your current workflow with the selected version. * **Clone to new workflow**: create a new workflow based on the selected version. * **Open version in new tab**: open a second tab displaying the selected version. Use this to compare versions. * **Download**: download the version as JSON.
